item.title: Swallow
item.description: Throughout the discussion, C-x means Control + x keychord. Introduction Window swallowing is a mechanism in tiling window managers, by which a GUI application’s window can replace the terminal window in-place, when the application is called from the terminal. This avoids congestion in tiling WMs, and is a much preferred solution than zooming into the said GUI window (Also called monocle mode in some WMs) For instance, consider a scenario where I want to spawn VLC from my terminal.
